category.name: wcf.user.contest
category.item: You got a new solution{if $event->getObject()->userID} from {$event->getObject()->username}{/if} to one of your contest listings.
You will get notifications for solutions to all new solutions for your contest entries.
New contest solution{if $event->getObject()->userID} by {$event->getObject()->username}{/if} to one of your contest listings.
You got a new solution{if $event->getObject()->userID} by {$event->getObject()->username}{/if} to one of your contest listings.

Hallo {$user->username},
{$event->getObject()->username} has published a new solution to one of your contest listings: "{$event->getObject()->getFormattedMessage()}"
Follow this link to read the solution online: [url]{@$pageURL}{@$event->getObject()->getURL()}[/url]
